last_episode_to_air.name: Look Before You Ed
last_episode_to_air.overview: Edd and Jimmy make a safety club to make winter safer, but it backfires when Jimmy thinks it's going awry.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy
overview: Three adolescent boys, Ed, Edd "Double D", and Eddy, collectively known as "the Eds", constantly invent schemes to make money from their peers to purchase their favorite confectionery, jawbreakers. Their plans usually fail though, leaving them in various predicaments.

episodes.name: The Ed-Touchables
episodes.overview: Edd is miffed because someone has been in his room, "touching things". So Eddy devises a plan to catch the mysterious "toucher" and make them all rich.

episodes.name: Nagged to Ed
episodes.overview: The Kanker Sisters find the Eds bug collecting and take them back to their mobile home. At first the Eds like it, but after a while things start to get rough.

episodes.name: Pop Goes the Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds find out that Nazz is having a sprinkler party. They try to show off in front of the kids and end up ripping off their skin-tight bathing suits.

episodes.name: Over Your Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy decides that he and Edd are going to teach Ed some social graces and turn him into a "swingin' dude".

episodes.name: Sir Ed-a-Lot
episodes.overview: Ed has to babysit his demanding and whiney sister Sarah. Edd and Eddy show up and reluctantly join "her majesty's" tea party.

episodes.name: A Pinch to Grow an Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy is unhappy because he thinks he's short. Edd makes him a pair of hydraulic, platform shoes.

episodes.name: Dawn of the Eds
episodes.overview: On their way to see a new sci-fi movie, the Eds' imaginations run amok. They crash land in the junkyard and think they're on another planet.

episodes.name: Virt-Ed-Go
episodes.overview: The Eds attempt to construct a club house in a neighborhood tree to solicit memberships from their friends, but not before the Kanker Sisters take it over.

episodes.name: Read All About Ed
episodes.overview: Edd takes on a paper route to save up for an electron microscope. Eddy is immediately lured by the prospect of big money.

episodes.name: Quick Shot Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds come across an old camera. They then decide to take pictures of all the cul-de-sac kids, put them in a calendar, and sell it back to them.

episodes.name: An Ed Too Many
episodes.overview: When Sarah falls in love with Edd, the rest of the gang tries to sabotage their relationship.

episodes.name: Ed-n-Seek
episodes.overview: The cul-de-sac kids are playing hide and go seek, and the Eds participate in the game.

episodes.name: Look Into My Eds
episodes.overview: Edd receives a hypnotizing pinwheel in the mail. Eddy then hypnotizes the kids.

episodes.name: Tag Yer Ed
episodes.overview: Edd needs to gain respect by winning a wrestling match.

episodes.name: Fool on the Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds decide to play practical jokes on the neighborhood children.

episodes.name: A Boy and His Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds try to befriend Kevin in order to gain access to his jawbreaker stash.

episodes.name: It's Way Ed
episodes.overview: After missing a fad, Eddy decides to start a new one.

episodes.name: Laugh Ed Laugh
episodes.overview: The cul-de-sac children come down with chicken pox, leaving the Eds with nothing to do for the day.

episodes.name: A Glass of Warm Ed
episodes.overview: Ed starts raiding neighbors' food while sleepwalking.

episodes.name: Flea-Bitten Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds open up a beauty salon for pets, convincing Rolf to let them clean his animals. Meanwhile, Ed learns he is allergic to rabbits.

episodes.name: Who, What, Where, Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds want to hatch their own chicken egg, which can only be obtained by trading with Rolf.

episodes.name: Keeping Up With the Eds
episodes.overview: Edd's parents tell him to mow the lawn. Eddy then gets an idea for a potential scam and causes trouble.

episodes.name: Eds-Aggerate
episodes.overview: After a scam goes horribly wrong and damages Kevin's house, Eddy makes up a quick lie, telling Kevin the "Mucky Boys" did it. Kevin is convinced, and soon the whole cul-de-sac is searching for the Mucky Boys.

episodes.name: Oath to an Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds get new clothes, which are still stiff from the store. Ed and Eddy try to break them in but end up ruining them. The Eds hear about the "Urban Rangers" and decide to join in order to receive their awesome uniforms.

episodes.name: Button Yer Ed
episodes.overview: Ed and Edd cannot understand Eddy when he loses his voice. When Edd devises a method of communication, there ends up being a lot of mistranslation.

episodes.name: Avast Ye Eds
episodes.overview: The Eds launch a cruise line on the local creek, getting Jonny 2x4 and Jimmy as customers. All goes well until the Kanker Sisters show up.

episodes.name: Know it All Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds find a box of turkey basters. Eddy sells them to the kids as Imported Canadian Squirt Guns. The cul-de-sac turns into the Wild West.

episodes.name: Dear Ed
episodes.overview: When the Eds find out Jonny 2x4 and Plank had a falling out, they form a matchmaking service.

episodes.name: Knock Knock Who's Ed?
episodes.overview: Sarah locks the Eds out of the house as a movie marathon starts. They try to get into the other kids' houses to watch it.

episodes.name: One + One = Ed
episodes.overview: Edd tells Eddy and Ed that to understand something, you have to take it apart so they take apart everything

episodes.name: Eeny, Meeny, Miney, Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy plays a joke on Ed's imagination and convinces him that Edd is a creature from another world.

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Ed
episodes.overview: Annoyed by Kevin's claims to setting world records, Eddy thinks he and his pals can do better and attempt to beat him at his own game.

episodes.name: Hands Across Ed
episodes.overview: After watching Ed perform a song-and-dance routine, Eddy decides to put on a show. The Eds announce a telethon to raise money for Ed's eyebrow operation.

episodes.name: Floss Your Ed
episodes.overview: Ed has a loose tooth. Edd and Eddy make attempts to pull it out but can't.

episodes.name: In Like Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy is convinced Kevin must be a spy so the Eds set up an agency to track Kevin's movements.

episodes.name: Who Let the Ed In?
episodes.overview: Lost in one of his moments, Ed introduces Eddy and Edd to his imaginary friend Jib.

episodes.name: Home Cooked Eds
episodes.overview: Eddy finds the Kanker sisters' trailer parked on his lawn for their vacation. The girls invade Ed, Edd and Eddy's lives, and Eddy resolves to find the Kankers a new spot.

episodes.name: Rambling Ed
episodes.overview: Worn out by Sarah's demands, Ed to packs his room and moves.

episodes.name: To Sir with Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy's parents are out for dinner and hired Nazz to baby-sit.

episodes.name: Key to My Ed
episodes.overview: Ed finds a key in the street, and Eddy is determined to find out what it opens.

episodes.name: Urban Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy thinks the pace of life is too slow so he schemes to turn the neighborhood into a cityscape.

episodes.name: Stop, Look and Ed
episodes.overview: Everywhere the Eds look, there's a sign saying they can't do something. Eddy convinces Ed and Edd that those rules don't apply to them.

episodes.name: Honor Thy Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy wander into a house and discover the Kankers have set it up for a wedding.

episodes.name: Scrambled Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy has come up with a scam but Edd's sleep deprived. Eddy and Ed put Edd to work but Edd can't think straight so his plans grow bizarre.

episodes.name: Rent-a-Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy and Edd form a repair company using Ed as their multi-purpose tool. The Eds go into kids' homes to repair broken things. Ed breaks everything he touches.

episodes.name: Shoo Ed
episodes.overview: Jonny 2x4 irritates Kevin by hanging around him all the time.

episodes.name: Ed in a Halfshell
episodes.overview: Sarah puts Ed in charge of Jimmy. When the guys attempt to play with Jimmy, Eddy decides to show him what it's like to be a grown-up.

episodes.name: Mirror, Mirror, on the Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds join the neighborhood kids in a game of Truth or Dare.

episodes.name: Hot Buttered Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy wake up early so they can be the first ones at the swimming hole. When they arrive, they find all the good spots are taken.

episodes.name: High Heeled Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy discover all the boys in the neighborhood are away at the go-cart races.

episodes.name: Fa, La, La, La, Ed
episodes.overview: Ed becomes convinced Santa is watching his every move so he avoids doing anything that could be interpreted as naughty.

episodes.name: Cry Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy is desperate for attention. When he sees the kids rescue Jimmy, Eddy decides to have accidents of his own.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Ed
episodes.overview: After losing a cul-de-sac race, Rolf mopes about how he is homesick and misses his old country. Eddy comes up with the scam of a lifetime. He pretends that Ed's shoe is a magic wishgiver. When Rolf asks to use it, Eddy declines until Rolf gives up some change. Rolf wishes to return to his home country, and the stench from Ed's shoe causes him to pass out. He wakes up in an old-world-style village created by the Eds. Edd's Encyclopedia of Old World Culture helped them to create a perfect replica. Eddy is satisfied, but Edd feels bad for Rolf and makes the Eds play along with their scam, so now they have to succumb to Rolf's odd culture. All goes well until a curious Jonny wrecks the whole thing.

episodes.name: Momma's Little Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy wants to get on with yet another summer day of scams, but Edd refuses to leave the house until he's done his chores. Eddy gets and idea and makes Ed forge some ridiculous sticky notes. Ed's a human Xerox machine, so Edd has no idea. Ed and Eddy spend the rest of the day watching Edd humiliate himself miserably. Edd begins to fear his parents, and decides to move in with Eddy. Eddy doesn't like it, but he has no choice against Edd's guilt routine, and now he's Edd's slave for life (until the next episode).

episodes.name: Once Upon an Ed
episodes.overview: Jonny and Plank are ready for bed, when suddenly he finds the Eds stuck in his bedroom wall. Jonny won't let them lose until they tell him how it happened, so they each give a piece of their story on how they escaped the wrath of the Kankers from their own skewed perspective. In the end, Jonny falls asleep before he pulls the Eds loose, and the Kankers show up to finish off the Eds.

episodes.name: For Your Ed Only
episodes.overview: A scam gone horribly, horribly wrong crash-lands the Eds in Sarah's bedroom. The Eds try to clean up the room before Sarah gets back, when Eddy uncovers her secret diary. Sarah chases after the Eds, while Ed and Edd try to persuade Eddy not to read the diary. In the end, the Eds and Jonny all get stuck together in a giant mess of ultra-powerful chewing gum.

episodes.name: It Came From Outer Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy and Edd come up with an idea to trick Ed for laughs. Eddy drags Ed from his room while he is reading his new comic, ""Evil Tim."" After this idea bombs, Ed thinks of an idea for a scam. Throughout the episode, they follow through Ed's scam, doing some senseless things. We find out, Ed's scam has nothing to do with taking everyone's cash, but is ideal for a curse.

episodes.name: 3 Squares and an Ed
episodes.overview: Edd is showing Eddy his laundry chutes, bragging about how he laced them with silicon. Unimpressed Eddy questions Edd. After Edd explains how fast they get to the bottom, Eddy takes off down one without listening to Edd's safety precautions. In the basement, Eddy stumbles upon Edd's failed inventions. Again, ignoring Edd, Eddy finds himself helpless to one of the older ones, messing up his face. Edd finds this funny, sending Eddy chasing him to Ed's house. Guardsmen Jimmy and Sarah stand in front of Ed's window, informing Eddy and Edd on how Ed's been grounded. Distractions involving Jonny, give Edd and Eddy time to sneak Ed out of the house. Of course, they get caught, and all three of the Ed's are grounded.

episodes.name: Dueling Eds
episodes.overview: The Ed's have a scam for Jonny. No one can resist karate! This scam is a failure, but is soon dropped when everyone's attention is directed to Rolf's house. Rolf is modeling his sea cucumber suit for everyone, and offering them some for eating. Eddy shames ""the son of a shepherd"" once he takes one of the sea cucumber balls, and tosses it at a hole in the fence. Edd gives Eddy a potted plant to give to Rolf for forgiveness. Turns out, this plant is the ""potted plant of ridicule"" and Rolf and Eddy ensue in a duel.

episodes.name: Dim Lit Ed
episodes.overview: After an encounter with Jimmy, Jonny, Ed and Eddy, Edd has come to the conclusion that the whole cul - de - sac lacks good judgment. Edd gathers everyone together, and encourages their education with a scavenger hunt. Rolf yells out that the prize is a jawbreaker, and everyone gets so excited, that Edd doesn't have time to tell them what the prize really is. Once everyone finds out the prize isn't what they expected, they all turn against Edd. To no surprise, the Eds get back together, and go back to scams.

episodes.name: Will Work for Ed
episodes.overview: The Ed's stumble upon a 3 for 1 Jawbreaker sale. Just so happens, they are all ""flat broke."" Rolf is nailing papers to light posts, just as the Ed's find him. He is looking for a hired hand, and Ed takes on this task, hoping to earn some cash. The day goes on, Ed messing up, getting continuous pay deductions from Rolf. After Eddy has had enough of this, Edd and he take on to help Ed with the job of peeling potatoes. Of course, they mess up, but Rolf and Edd come up with an agreement.

episodes.name: Ed, Ed and Away
episodes.overview: The Eds come up with a plan to scam Kevin into a new ""Custom Hot Bike."" After Kevin finds out that it's just for looks, he promises he'll get the dorks. The Eds spot an abandoned balloon floating freely, as Edd yells about all his hard work. Ed and Eddy have plans to pop it, while Edd is sure to stop them. The chase goes on, the Eds hopelessly trying to get the balloon. After the second time they interrupt Sarah and Jimmy's ""flight,"" they declare revenge on the Eds, and easily capture the balloon. Eddy takes back the balloon, but sadly doesn't get to pop it himself. In the end, it was Kevin who is letting free the balloons.

episodes.name: X Marks the Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy discovers that he has a pimple, and Rolf might be able to make it go away.

episodes.name: From Here to Ed
episodes.overview: After a scam gone wrong, Eddy declares war on Kevin, much to Edd's disgust. Kevin insists he was completely uninvolved in the scam's failure.

episodes.name: Boys Will Be Eds
episodes.overview: Most of the boys develop a crush on Nazz, and follow her everywhere. They all try to win her over.

episodes.name: Ed or Tails
episodes.overview: Ed ordered a pack of two jawbreakers, and now Edd tries to share the jawbreakers between three people.

episodes.name: Gimme, Gimme Never Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds' spend the whole day making rides for Plank.

episodes.name: My Fair Ed
episodes.overview:
Ed and Eddy are rummaging through Edd's groceries, Eddy pulls out some brocoli and Ed runs away scared destroying everything in his path. The kids are upset by this and tell Edd to set them straight or they'll twist his legs into a pretzel. He tries to reform them by ripping a bandaid of their head every time they fail.

He believes it to have worked, the two go out and start to ""help people"" but are screwing everything up and turn out to be worse than before. The next day Edd is ashamed and wants his old friends back and Ed and Eddy reveal the were playing and that they fooled him, Edd takes some brocoli and begins to chase them for ""toying with his emotions.""

episodes.name: Rock-a-Bye Ed
episodes.overview: After Ed has a nightmare, he develops a phobia to Jonny.

episodes.name: O-Ed Eleven
episodes.overview: While going through his brother's old stuff, Eddy and his friends stumble upon a map to Eddy's brother's "secret stash" and decipher it, only to find it lies underneath the Kankers' trailer.

episodes.name: The Luck of the Ed
episodes.overview: Ed forgot where he hid Eddy's magazines, and they spend the day finding them. But he starts to think that Edd knows something that Eddy doesn't know.

episodes.name: Ed, Pass it On
episodes.overview: After Eddy's restaurant scam fails, Eddy decides to start a rumor about his big brother coming home that eventually gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Brother, Can You Spare an Ed?
episodes.overview: Sarah wants Ed to buy her fudge with her money, but Eddy has other ideas.

episodes.name: The Day the Ed Stood Still
episodes.overview: To attract customers to their arcade, Edd puts Ed in a monster costume. Now, Ed thinks he is a monster, and starts eating all of the kids.

episodes.name: If It Smells Like an Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds' are the ones being blamed for ruining friendship day, and they now must prove they did not.

episodes.name: Don't Rain on My Ed
episodes.overview: The Eds' are the ones being blamed for ruining friendship day, and they now must prove they did not.

episodes.name: Once Bitten, Twice Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy keeps tweaking a scam and tries to keep business running.

episodes.name: An Ed in the Bush
episodes.overview: Rolf readies The Urban Rangers for their hike into the nearby woods, but it's near dark. Eddy attempts to scare The Urban Rangers to prove they are big phonies.

episodes.name: See No Ed
episodes.overview: Kevin and the rest of the kids are in the lane when the kids realize they haven't seen the Eds all day. Kevin thinks they are up to something, while the others celebrate.

episodes.name: Is There an Ed in the House?
episodes.overview: Sarah gets sick, and both Ed and Jimmy try to help her, which strikes a rivalry between them.

episodes.name: An Ed is Born
episodes.overview: Eddy proves to his brother that he is a big shot by making a home movie.

episodes.name: One Size Fits Ed
episodes.overview: After Jimmy makes a wish at the Ed's fake wishing well to become a star, the Eds attempt to make Jimmy's wish come true into a sumo wrestling star, thanks to the inspiration of Ed's new sumo hobby.

episodes.name: Pain in the Ed
episodes.overview: When Ed begins to take violin lessons which annoy the heck out of Eddy, he makes several attempts to destroy the violin while Double-D tries to keep Eddy from smashing it.

episodes.name: Ed Overboard
episodes.overview: Eddy and Ed must turn to the Urban Rangers for help after the Kanker Sisters kidnap Ed.

episodes.name: One of Those Eds
episodes.overview: Everyone in the neighborhood competes to be the first to remove a quarter that's stuck to the sidewalk.

episodes.name: They Call Him Mr. Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy spend the day attempting to move up in the world.

episodes.name: For the Ed, by the Ed
episodes.overview: When Jimmy nominates Plank to be King of the Cul-de-sac, Eddy decides to run an election campaign against him.

episodes.name: Little Ed Blue
episodes.overview: Ed is in a bad mood, and Edd and Eddy try to cheer him up.

episodes.name: A Twist of Ed
episodes.overview: Edd gives the Kankers some tough love with his reverse psychology.

episodes.name: Your Ed Here
episodes.overview: Eddy is horrified when Kevin finds out that Eddy's middle name is Skipper.

episodes.name: The Good Ol' Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy reminisce about past exploits when Edd asks them to contribute to his new time capsule.

episodes.name: Thick as an Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy is caught in the middle when Edd and Ed fight over Ed's stinky jacket.

episodes.name: Sorry, Wrong Ed
episodes.overview: Ed, Edd and Eddy run afoul of Rolf's cursed phone.

episodes.name: Robbin' Ed
episodes.overview: A hero is foiling Eddy's scams, and he becomes a villian to take down this hero

episodes.name: A Case of Ed
episodes.overview: After reading a medical textbook, Edd becomes convinced that he has symptoms of a terminal disease.

episodes.name: Run for your Ed
episodes.overview: The Kanker sisters are combing the cul-de-sac for a missing heirloom when Edd and Eddy discover that it's stuck on Ed's finger.

episodes.name: Hand Me Down Ed
episodes.overview: A mysterious neighborhood toy is passed from one person to another, changing everyone who touches it.

episodes.name: Stiff Upper Ed
episodes.overview: When Ed, Edd and Eddy are refused entry into Sarah and Jimmy's exclusive club, Eddy attempts to ""out-rich"" the snobby membership.

episodes.name: Here's Mud in Your Ed
episodes.overview: After Eddy creates a scam called Smileyville, which makes Jimmy's bad day worse by scamming him out of his last quarter, Rolf and Jimmy team up to turn the tables on Eddy by pulling his leg and ripping him off.

episodes.name: Stuck in Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy can't think of a scam, and hires Jimmy to make a scam.

episodes.name: Postcards from the Ed
episodes.overview: When Plank's "parents" come to town, Ed irritates Eddy by offering to show them around the cul-de-sac. But then Eddy gets the idea to take them on his own tour.

episodes.name: Take This Ed and Shove It
episodes.overview: Eddy gives jobs to the growing up kids, and Eddy gets injured and falls into a deep sleep. He then wakes up... 90 years in the future!

episodes.name: Mission Ed-Possible
episodes.overview: Report card day is no fun for the Ed's, because Edd is delivering Eddy and Ed's report cards to their parents. The Eds find out what's going on and attempt to stop him.

episodes.name: Every Which Way But Ed
episodes.overview: Flashback episode that features alternate stories. The Eds try to make their way back to the place all the flashbacks began. In this journey many things are explained, including: Plank's chip (Plank got stuck in Rolf's teeth), and why Jimmy wears a retainer (the Eds tricked him into eating a bowling pin when he thought it was a cream horn).

episodes.name: Boom Boom Out Goes the Ed
episodes.overview: The power goes out, and everyone's wondering what happened. Ed starts a panic when he blames the blackout on "mole mutants" (a parody of the C.H.U.D.s and The Mole People), and Eddy tries to cash in. Meanwhile, Rolf enlists Kevin in jump-starting the power grid, and Edd overcomes his fear of the unsanitary sewers to conduct his own investigation.

episodes.name: Cleanliness Is Next to Edness
episodes.overview: Edd tries to take his morning shower, but blunders into the bathroom to find it is undergoing repair. He desperately tries to borrow a shower from one of his neighbors, but as Edd gets progressively dirtier in his quest to find a place to bathe, he eventually goes off the deep end, which means the more nobody would help Edd, the more dirtier he'd be.

episodes.name: Out with the Old, In with the Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy tries to convince the kids of the cul-de-sac (and himself) that it is still summer, even though it is actually the day before school starts. At school, the Eds find they've been assigned separate home rooms, and must negotiate with the Kanker Sisters if they want to spend the school year together.

episodes.name: I Am Curious Ed
episodes.overview: Sarah and Jimmy discover Jimmy's fish have babies and try to learn where they come from, but when they ask the other kids about it, they keep getting different answers. They eventually turn to the Eds for help, but even they can't agree on the subject of human reproduction.

episodes.name: No Speak Da Ed
episodes.overview: Ed receives a variety of wolf-themed gifts from his pen-pal, and ends up suffering the wrath of Rolf, who suspects said pen-pal is actually his old arch-nemesis, and ends up sending the Eds to Norway.

episodes.name: Cool-Hand Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy plans to break out of school, enlisting the help of the other Eds and Jonny.

episodes.name: Too Smart for His Own Ed
episodes.overview: Edd is embarrassed to no end after losing to Ed in the annual spelling bee. All the other kids think he's lost his touch, and turn to Ed for help with their homework (even though Eddy insists they pay for the privilege). Meanwhile, Jonny seeks revenge on Nazz after she eliminated Plank from the Spelling Bee for not spelling a word clearly.

episodes.name: Who's Minding the Ed?
episodes.overview: When Rolf goes to his family reunion, he puts Ed in charge of his animals.

episodes.name: Pick an Ed
episodes.overview: After Eddy reads "Eddy is a no neck chump" on the wall, he goes undercover as "Carl" to find out who wrote that. While he's with the kids, he is surprised that they actually treat him with respect. Eddy decides to ditch Ed and Edd and hang with the other kids, but Edd is determined to get him back.

episodes.name: Truth or Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy starts publishing a newspaper full of lies about the other kids, and sells them for cash.

episodes.name: This Won't Hurt an Ed
episodes.overview: When Eddy discovers that Kevin has Trypanophobia, he takes advantage of his fear and tells the school that it's booster shot day.

episodes.name: Tinker Ed
episodes.overview: Due to another scam failure, Jimmy doesn't believe in fairy tales anymore, bringing him in a sad emotional state which won't go away. Sarah demands the Ed's to fix this before sundown. Meanwhile, Rolf thinks everyone is after his backpack full of baloney.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad and The Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy tries to prove that the Urban Rangers are a bunch of phonies by challenging Rolf to the most difficult badge- The Hairy Chest of Resilience Badge.

episodes.name: Tight End Ed
episodes.overview: Peach Creek's football team must play a game against Lemon Brook, but the team is hopeless. Nazz thinks its due to low team spirit, so she decides to make Ed the mascot. During the game, Eddy becomes jealous that the audience is cheering for Ed, not the football team, so Eddy attempts to create a mascot of his own.

episodes.name: 'Tween a Rock and an Ed Place
episodes.overview: Jonny invites the Ed's to the Arbor Day party. Eddy hopes that the party will have all the kids there in attempt to boost his popularity, but his hopes are crushed when he discovers nobody else went.

episodes.name: All Eds Are Off
episodes.overview: The Eds, Kevin, Rolf, and Jonny all make bets who can put off their annoying habits the longest. Eddy must stop talking in a loud voice, Ed cannot have any gravy, Double D must stop talking using complicated words (words with more than one syllable), Johnny must go on without Plank, Kevin has to stop calling the Eds "dorks", and Rolf must stop eating meat. The winner will win $1.25.

episodes.name: Smile for the Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy can move into his big brother's room if he brings home a good picture for his mother. Kevin distracts Eddy when the picture is taken, resulting in an ugly picture. Kevin decides to take advantage of this and shows Eddy's embarrassing picture to everyone in the school.

episodes.name: Run Ed Run
episodes.overview: Due to an argument between Eddy and Sarah about bus seating, she tricks Ed into protecting his friends from the falling sky. Edd and Eddy can't talk Ed out of it, but they make several attempts to catch the bus and get to the Jawbreaker factory.

episodes.name: A Town Called Ed
episodes.overview: Eddy isn't allowed to go to Kevin's monster truck marathon party. The Eds discover a book stating that Eddy's ancestors founded Peach Creek, and Eddy attempts to use that history to lure the kids away from Kevin's party.

episodes.name: A Fistful of Ed
episodes.overview: Edd accidentally hurts Lee Kanker, making everyone believe he resorts to violence. He then makes mistakes during school hours which causes some of the kids to be hurt or injured. When all of the cul-de-sac (save for Eddy) is turned against Edd, it is up to Jimmy to restore his former reputation.

episodes.name: May I Have This Ed?
episodes.overview: The Eds attend their first school dance. Edd isn't too excited about going, but naturally, Eddy is stoked.

episodes.name: Look Before You Ed
episodes.overview: Edd and Jimmy make a safety club to make winter safer, but it backfires when Jimmy thinks it's going awry.
